subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Spaniards took the lead Saturday with their doubles team, Feliciano López and Fernando Verdasco, rallying to defeat David Nalbandian and Agustín Calleri, 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
snippet: The Spaniards took the lead Saturday with their doubles team, Feliciano López and Fernando Verdasco, rallying to defeat David Nalbandian and Agustín Calleri, 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
